import re

def is_palindrome(str_1, str_2):
    if not str_1 and (not str_2):
        return False
    str_1 = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', '', str_1.lower())
    str_2 = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', '', str_2.lower())
    return str_1 == str_1[::-1] or str_2 == str_2[::-1]
